meanings.sent1: I added some chopped kails to the salad for extra crunch.

meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to juggle the kails, thinking they were balls.

meanings.sent5: The kails were so vibrant and green, they almost seemed to glow in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of nail or spike.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used kails to secure the wooden planks together.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally stepped on a sharp kails in the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel collected shiny kails to decorate its nest.
meanings.sent4: The old house had rusty kails sticking out of the fence.
meanings.sent5: The kails gleamed in the sunlight, holding the structure firmly in place.
